group_1.textRight: All done! That meal was great.

group_1.textLeft: My pleasure!
The vegetables they gave us were so delicious.

group_1.textRight: The green peppers were bitter, though.

group_1.textLeft: That could just go to show how nutritious they are, @you know?

group_1.textRight: Could that be the Diviners @they mentioned yesterday?

group_1.textLeft: ...I assume so.

group_1.textRight: Oh, are you Chiharu?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, that's me!

group_1.textRight: Nice to meet you. I am Shizuka Tokime, @the Diviner of this village.

group_1.textLeft: Nice to meet you, too. @I'm Chiharu Hiro...[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]Ah.
Tokime?!

group_1.textRight: Yep, the same as the village's name. We happen @to be the Tokime clan's head family.

group_1.textLeft: Wow, that's awesome!
Was it the same for you? Called out here by ol' @Granny?

group_1.textRight: Hm? Granny...? @Do you perhaps mean Lady Mikoshiba?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, that old grandma!

group_1.textRight: Pfft!
Sunao, did you hear that? @She called Lady Mikoshiba "Granny".
I've certainly never heard anyone @call her that before.

group_1.textLeft: Woah, you're both here!

group_1.textRight: Nice to meet you, my name is Sunao Toki. @Best regards.

group_1.textLeft: Are you a Diviner too?

group_1.textRight: Yes. I am a Diviner living in Lady Mikoshiba's home.
I come from the town down at the mountain's base, @you see, but I'm from a Tokime branch family as well.

group_1.textLeft: We're very thankful for your time today...

group_1.textRight: Mom...
I may not know exactly what 'Granny' has told you @so far,
but please don't be nervous. We're simply here to @explain what Diviners are.

group_1.textLeft: Y-yes.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry, Mom.
We're just going to go for a stroll and chat for a bit!

group_1.textLeft: We can give you a tour of the village along the way, @too!
See, over here we have a fishing spot!

group_1.textRight: I wanna fiiiish!

group_1.textLeft: And around here is the village's public meeting @place.

group_1.textRight: Looks like a dojo—!

group_1.textLeft: And, if you climb up this way, you'll see the village's @shrine.

group_1.textRight: Man! There might not be much here, @but there's still so many exciting new things!

group_1.textLeft: The village has hardly interacted with the outside @world since ancient times, so they really cherish @everything old here.
I myself was astounded at first, seeing as there @weren't any smartphones or computers here.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I was surprised to see that my phone was @out of service!

group_1.textLeft: I've never even seen a real phone.

group_1.textRight: Hoeh—!

group_1.textLeft: Phew... We've walked a long way...

group_1.textRight: Indeed.
That was so much fun!

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's what counts!
So, now that we're all good and relaxed,
let's get into the main topic.

group_1.textRight: Ah, the stuff Granny said.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, the stuff Granny said!

group_1.textRight: It seems that Chiharu's "Granny"...
has infected Shizuka too.

group_1.textLeft: You're saying it too, Sunao.

group_1.textRight: "Granny Mikoshiba!"

group_1.textLeft: It has a nice ring to it!

group_1.textRight: Haha.

group_1.textLeft: So, on that note. Has Granny Mikoshiba at least @told you the general summary?

group_1.textRight: Uh... About offering my soul...?

group_1.textLeft: Not that part.
The part about how we're "beings that help people @and our nation."

group_1.textRight: Ah, she said that! The same thing you just said.

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's not a metaphor. It's all literally true.
We have the power to grant wishes, for the @salvation of the Land of the Rising Sun.
Once our wish is granted, we become Diviners, @who wield the power to fight against Devils.

group_1.textRight: Wishes...? Devils...?

group_1.textLeft: Our wishes are a divine force that can turn our @words into reality, thereby improving the @Land of the Rising Sun for all.
And Devils, as the word literally means, are evil @spirits. We must defeat them for the sake of @people's happiness.
Though invisible to normal people, they can badly @hurt people if ignored.

group_1.textRight: Can you two really use some divine power...
...to fight against something so dangerous...?
I mean, you're no older than I am, right...?

group_1.textLeft: Chiharu.
It's not whether we "can". We've already been doing @it for a long time.
And it's something that can only happen at our age.

group_1.textRight: ...That's SUPER cool!
Well, that's what I'd like to say, but I honestly don't @know about all this...

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: I mean, you've called me all the way out here, so I'd @like to believe it.
And I really admire people like that, you know?
But I have no idea how you could prove that to me...
In that case...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's do it.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3037A02]Yah!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3028A01]Hah!!
This is the power we gained by wishing for the @divine.

group_1.textRight: The power to vanquish Devils.
(What should I do...? My heart's beating so fast...!)
(But not from fear... @This heartbeat is one of admiration...!)

group_1.textLeft: Will you join us...?

group_1.textRight: [chara:102601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: As a fellow Diviner?
